channel.title: Gas on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Gas on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 South - Next Gas 90 Miles
item.description: Next Gas 90 Miles on US-395 south. The next gas in this case is in Valley Falls. These types of signs are common in eastern Oregon after leaving a settlement with a gas pump.

item.title: US-93 North - Next Gas 78 Miles
item.description: Next Gas 78 Miles on US-93 north. Taken just north of the Alt. US-93/US-93 intersection. Wells is the next city with gas.
